title: Update Failed ?!?!?!
body:
Please someone help ahhhhhhhh I've been trying for hours to open and play LOL. I can't for the love of gosh get this game to load every time I try to launch it, it has to update so I wait, and than the message _Update Failed: Please Check the logs for more information_ 

I have tried to un-download the game and re-download it but nothing is working please someone help!! :((((

replies.body:
Patching issues can be caused by a number of potential factors: permissions issues, a poor connection to the servers and corrupt installation, just to name a few. The guide that *Rineyy* provided will address the most common fixes for this and I think it's a great place to start in troubleshooting this issue.

If you still have patching issues after working through those steps, please let me know.
